title: Add the location -58,29 to the Points of Interest
body:
> by 0x7abe70215d3f7c823ce970379169823c02efe4cf (PossumDynamite)

## VR Shopping District Estate

![VR Shopping District Estate](https://api.decentraland.org/v1/parcels/-58/29/map.png)

Should the scene located at -58,29 be added to the Point of Interest list?

## Description

Longtale Studios leads guided tours into the Decentraland metaverse. Our estate is an entry point for discovery, learning, and creativity. We are in our creative infancy. We want to expose the mainstream to the possibilities of the metaverse.

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=8b4ad470-3bb1-11ec-be0c-afec86cba5e5)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
